sentences.sContent: Employers have an obligation to treat all employees equally.
sentences.sCn: 雇主有责任对所有员工一视同仁。

sentences.sContent: Parents are under a legal obligation to educate their children.
sentences.sCn: 家长对子女的教育负有法律责任。

sentences.sContent: You are under no obligation to buy any more books.
sentences.sCn: 你不必非要买更多的书。

sentences.sContent: Greater resources are needed to meet these obligations.
sentences.sCn: 履行这些义务需要更多的资源。

sentences.sContent: the rights and obligations imposed on them by treaties
sentences.sCn: 条约给他们规定的权利和义务

sentences.sContent: The government must pay for health care for war veterans – it is an obligation we owe to them.
sentences.sCn: 政府必须为退伍军人支付医疗保健费用——这是我们对他们负有的义务。

sentences.sContent: a moral obligation to help the poor
He stayed with the team out of a sense of obligation.
sentences.sCn: 他出于责任感而留在队里。
